name: Amogus Hostile Takeover
description:
Amogus Hostile Takeover

After the 2018 hit game called "Among Us" released by Innersloth LLC, there has been a lot of hype around the games' characters called 'crew mates' or as the internet named them 'Amogus'.

Hearing this, wouldn't you wish that there was a game in which you could try to takeover the dangerous and armed amogus' territory? Well fear not 'cause I have exactly what you wish for: A game where you have to fight armed and dangerous amogus in order to takeover their territory.

Features

  • Beautiful graphics created with Unreal Engine 5.
  • Amogus with space gun!
  • Amogus drip song.
  • Amogus EDM remix by memicus.
  • COD inspired weapon system & HUD.

Disclaimer

  • This game is a fan made game after the game "Among Us" owned by Innersloth LLC. The game contains copyrighted media owned by the company mentioned above, therefore I am under no circumstances seeking any financial revenue or any other type of benefits. If someone at Innersloth LLC wants me to take this game down, they can email me or create a thread on the community section and I will comply.
  • The game is currently on the heavier side presenting pretty bad performance. I will try to improve this performance in further updates.
  • I made this game in order to get accustomed with UE5 as I am transitioning from Unity. I tried to touch on almost everything like animations, 3d modeling, map design, blueprints, UI and more.
  • Report any bugs in the community section! Thanks!

Have Fun!

Jamal
